title: Live Crime Reporting System
description: A comprehensive real-time crime reporting platform that enables citizens to report incidents with location tracking. The system features instant community alerts within a 1 km radius, collaborative incident verification through user validation, and automated escalation to law enforcement when multiple confirmations are received. Built with secure user authentication and real-time notifications to enhance public safety.

title: eCommerce Website
description: A fully functional eCommerce platform featuring product catalog management, shopping cart operations, and seamless user experience. Includes dynamic product filtering, persistent cart storage using local storage, responsive product grids, and intuitive checkout interface. Demonstrates strong front-end development skills with clean, maintainable code architecture.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing professional achievements, technical skills, and project portfolio. Features smooth scroll navigation, interactive UI components, optimized performance, and cross-browser compatibility. Designed with attention to user experience and visual hierarchy to effectively present professional credentials.

title: Emergency Service
description: A dynamic web application demonstrating advanced DOM manipulation and asynchronous JavaScript capabilities. Features real-time data fetching, interactive UI components, and efficient state management without external frameworks. Serves as a technical showcase of pure JavaScript proficiency for modern web development roles.

title: Green Earth: Dynamic Tree Planting App
description: An environmentally-focused web application that promotes tree plantation through an engaging user interface. Integrates with external APIs for comprehensive plant data, features dynamic cart management with real-time calculations, and provides detailed plant information. Built with mobile-first responsive design and optimized performance for seamless user interaction.

title: Customer Support System
description: A React-based customer support ticket management system with comprehensive administrative features. Includes ticket creation, status tracking, priority management, and resolution workflows. Demonstrates advanced state management, conditional rendering, and dynamic UI updates essential for enterprise-level application development.
